When rendering' the "  				+ "colors will be linearly interpolated. But there's a problem that appears when drawing adjacent "  				+ "triangles with Anti-Aliasing. Anti-Aliased polygons do not 'dock' to each other correctly' there "  				+ "visual artifacts at the edges appear. I call it “the problem of adjacent edges”. AGG has a simple"  				+ " mechanism that allows you to get rid of the artifacts' just dilating the polygons and/or changing "  				+ "the gamma-correction value. But it's tricky' because the values depend on the opacity of the polygons."  				+ " In this example you can change the opacity' the dilation value and gamma.
